actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to encourage the State to extend coverage under their State unemployment compensation laws to agricultural labor.

summary.text: Provides that a grant shall be made to a State with respect to any calendar year after 1965 for a deficit in the State unemployment compensation account attributable to agricultural labor. Sets forth procedures governing the making of such grants.

titles.title: A bill to encourage the State to extend coverage under their State unemployment compensation laws to agricultural labor.
